technical_parameters.name: temp
technical_parameters.description: Controls the randomness/creativity of the output. Higher values produce more varied results.

technical_parameters.name: cfg
technical_parameters.description: Classifier Free Guidance - controls how closely the model follows your prompt. Higher values adhere more closely.

technical_parameters.name: seed
technical_parameters.description: Sets a specific random seed for deterministic generation. Same seed + same parameters = same result.

technical_parameters.name: duration
technical_parameters.description: Controls the length of the generated track in seconds.

technical_parameters.name: key
technical_parameters.values: C, C#, D, D#, E, F, F#, G, G#, A, A#, B

technical_parameters.name: bpm
technical_parameters.description: Beats per minute - controls the tempo of the track.

additional_parameters.name: reference_song
additional_parameters.description: A reference song to influence the style and sound of the generation.
additional_parameters.values: String with artist name and song title

additional_parameters.name: top_k
additional_parameters.description: Limits the model to only consider the top K most likely tokens at each step.

additional_parameters.name: top_p
additional_parameters.description: Nucleus sampling parameter - sets a probability threshold for token selection.
